name: IDC: Creativity
description:
In a broken world, the Keeper of Apathy, Filly, has created a daughter named Mitty to perform various odd jobs for her. They range from asinine to dangerous in nature and today's is one of the latter: Filly wants one of her fellow Keepers dead, namely the Keeper of Creativity. Unenthusiastic, but dutiful, Mitty feels compelled to obey. Along this journey, she shall meet strange individuals (like You), slay unpleasant enemies and collect weird items. It's not the best life, nor is it the best world... but maybe You can liven it up?

This is one of hopefully many small stories I would like to tell involving this world and its characters. I hope you enjoy Yourself! Do let me know what you think and if you would like to see more.
